channel.title: CVE Feed for mySCADA -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for mySCADA -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-27505|2024-08-03T21:26:10.394Z -- myscada -- mypro
item.description: mySCADA myPRO versions prior to 8.20.0 does not restrict unauthorized read access to sensitive directory listing information.

item.title: CVE-2021-23198|2024-08-03T19:05:55.652Z -- myscada -- mypro
item.description: mySCADA myPRO: Versions 8.20.0 and prior has a feature where the password can be specified, which may allow an attacker to inject arbitrary operating system commands through a specific parameter.

item.title: CVE-2021-22657|2024-08-03T18:51:05.997Z -- myscada -- mypro
item.description: mySCADA myPRO: Versions 8.20.0 and prior has a feature where the API password can be specified, which may allow an attacker to inject arbitrary operating system commands through a specific parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-4708|2024-08-01T20:47:41.657Z -- myscada -- mypro
item.description:
mySCADA myPRO
uses a hard-coded password which could allow an attacker to remotely execute code on the affected device.

item.title: CVE-2024-4708|2024-07-05T21:23:04.236Z -- myscada -- mypro
item.description:
mySCADA myPRO
uses a hard-coded password which could allow an attacker to remotely execute code on the affected device.

item.title: CVE-2024-4708|2024-07-23T20:56:09.695Z -- myscada -- mypro
item.description:
mySCADA myPRO
uses a hard-coded password which could allow an attacker to remotely execute code on the affected device.
